title: Dream 11 AI Predictor
description: Developed an AI-based predictor for Dream 11, a fantasy sports platform. Utilized machine learning algorithms to analyze historical data and player statistics for outcome predictions and optimal team compositions.

title: Mirza Ghalib Poetry Generator
description: Created a poetry generator inspired by the works of Mirza Ghalib, incorporating natural language processing techniques. Implemented recurrent neural networks or Markov chains to mimic Ghalib's style and language patterns.

title: Flask Chat App Website
description: Designed and developed a real-time chat application using Flask, a Python web framework. Integrated features such as user authentication, message encryption, and multimedia support for enhanced user experience.
